replies.body: What an unnecessary and excessive buff for Evelynn.
Logged in to upvote this. Your comment deserves to be at the top.

It's only a buff to the empowered Ult which is only in effect after you fall below 30% hp. I've missed tons of kills ulting them when they are below the hp threshold yet they still survive which is silly considering its an execution ability overall not that big a buff she still has to full combo an individual to get you to 30% hp to then ult you which is the entire design of her kit. On top of this the ult is the only significant aoe ability she has so unless your whole team is low enough to clean up she's only going to get 1 or 2 of you anyway.
yeah except when she was reworked they explicitly said that her ult was not intended to be a guaranteed kill. https://youtu.be/ep_U4U6YW4E?t=175
i think she could've used a very minor buff but not to her god damn most powerful ability thats broken alone

I wish you’d stop gutting champions because of pro-play. That seems unfair considering 99% of your player base is not pro play.

Can’t you nerf it for just pro games or something? 

Also I haven’t seen a single A-Sol main say they enjoy 
the changes.

The Ekko buffs are not needed nor wanted. Even Ekko mains are like hey what? 

How much did you add to his stun??

Lee sin doesn’t need these buffs I don’t know why you’re so obsessed with him. 

Oh it’s for worlds. How about you stop fucking over the player base for worlds. Seriously what is that .02 of the player base?

You guy make me fucking sick sometimes, prestige skins are pathetic cash grab, the new champs are unbalanced as fuck, Sylas has a dash, shield, stun/knock up, a HEAL THAT ALSO IS AN EXECUTE, Mordes ult? New akali? New Irelia? Pykes gold share? Zoe? What the fuck is your balance team smoking and can I have some?

I would 100% quit this game if I wasn’t addicted.

"I would 100% quit this game if I wasnt addicted."
Has a more relatable statement ever been spoken?
Why buff lee
it's worlds
I wanna see the return of the best western lee sin this year
Best Western?  Sounds like a place you'd find Residentsleepers {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Where is all the TFT stuff???
tft has its own patch notes, go there.

A normally unseen champ is getting played in pro play? Better nerf them instead of the champs seen every game.  {{champion:113}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:517}}

Yep 65 health is going to fix Aurelion Sol, thanks Riot
Honestly who thought the W change was a good idea? If the early game counterplay was the problem, why not add the toggle back  to lvl 9 just like you did with Urgot's W last time?
are you not aware of just how effective health is in the early game?

He could have a additional 500hp but I would still want old sol back.

Revert sol 2k19

as someone who mains tahm kench, if a champion's playstyle, identity or core ideas are lost in the process of a change (aatrox revive, morde's ghost, tahm kench's... anything) it doesn't matter how successful a champion is, the reason you'd play said champ is gone and likely won't return. other stuff like pointless / suboptimal ratios on champs being removed also can take away the fun of a playstyle, even if it isn't what the devs intended (unless it's literally just better)

i'll sum it up like this: if they took out what you liked about a champ, they aren't as fun and if it isn't fun, why bother.
RIP Galio. All the stat buffs in the world can't bring back the enjoyment of Taunt/Flash.
Agreed. A toggle at level 9 would be amazing. But I think they should at least increase the duration or just completely revert the W changes.
Riot please hear to what the boards and the subreddit r/Aurelion_Sol_mains asking to revert the rework.
Agreed while it was nice that asol got some love, it was not a step in the right direction.
Rumble Mains say "hi!"

Actually triggers me to no end the shit they do to make champions "easier to play for newer players". Every time they do it they ruin a champion: Rumble, Ryze, and now Asol. Like lmao if you're a newer player play an easier champion, why does Riot have to dumb good champions down for them. 

And people are going to tell me "Rumble is fine", but all I have say is that he's even more clunky than before now that you have to wait an extra 0.5s every time you want to hover around 50 heat because of the change they made to it. Ruined for me, at least.
Skarner mains say "hi!"

With these buffs to Evelynn and Lee Sin Ultimates I am seeing a pattern of adding 2-3 hundred damage every time you rank it up. Another Early game jungler who would like to "capitalize on early game successes with more powerful ultimates so he can have more of an impact" is Xin Zhao. His ult only does 75 dmg early game and goes up only by 100. Many times casting the ultimate takes so long that you lose dps.
Please show me these champs whose ultimates get "2-3 hundred damage every time you rank it up" I would really like to play them in ranked.

We'll ignore scaling damage ultimates like Akali and Veigar for now: Lee Sin gets 225 base damage with each rank in his ultimate after the first. Evelynn gets 300 on the empowered portion. Pantheon gets 200.
If you're interested in non-jungle champions, Caitlyn and Neeko also get 225. Syndra gets as much as 350, depending on the number of active spheres. There are probably more, but that's a good start. Enjoy Ranked.
Thank goodness I’m not the only one who agrees with this. They are buffing champion ults that we’re perfectly fine, instead of buffing champions that actually need the ult buffs like you mentioned.

@Riot

These Akali changes are utter fucking garbage. There's no reason to continually gut her kit. May as well just re-rework her. Would be a better use of your resources. Keep the model and shit, but redo her abilities since you guys can't seem to agree on anything and just made her absolute dogshit to play.
She's getting the pro play treatment nerf.  It's shit that pro play continually ruins champions (See Galio, Tahm Kench, Aatrox,Sylas Ornn (although Ornn they've sent help)

Can we just admit that the akali rework is a total nightmare to balance and at this point it would be better to just admit it was a mistake and revert it? I can't be the only one who feels this way...
Rot has reverted so many reworks. Its kinda sad that they cant get like any of them right, even after extensive balancing.
Yet another terrible patch buffing damage on several who don't need it, while continuing to beat down some scapegoats; even more unwanted garbage to top it off while ignoring community feedback.
Accessibility options are not "unwanted garbage." Feel free to be mad about the rest, though.

Screen shake doesn't make it easier to see what's going on, that by design goes against clarity, nor does it improve accessibility.  Also seen plenty of posts disliking and detailing what's wrong with the skins, I wouldn't get them anyway so I wasn't going to explain that.
There's always been screen shake. This is the option to turn it OFF. Please read closer next time.

Still no Zac buffs? Please revert w damage from 25 to 40 and make him viable in high elo for once. Just because he is simple to use does not mean he should be so weak. Literally cannot carry games with him with how weak he is. Khazix recently got a 10 damage buff on his Q, so I am certain that a 15 damage buff on Zac's W would be fair and give him the little extra he needs to become viable in challenger. Really hoping to see this change next patch please.
